channel.title: Can someone help me get commands on my server? (read more plz)
channel.description: hey i was wondering how i could make a ::commands list commands and a ::rules command and add my own rules etc... please someone help me thanks...

item.title: Can someone help me get commands on my server? (read more plz)
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

idk if its a delta it would be like

public void ServerHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@" + "5.53.106.141", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(),
            8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@" + "admin", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@" + " ", 8150);
    sendQuest("@dbl@Test", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@" + " ---", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@" + ", 8153);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}

then make a command to open that
